description: Try our easy to follow Charred Vegetable Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Vegetable dishes,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Charred Vegetable Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 Ben's Original TM Mexican Style Microwave Rice 250g
1 red capsicum, seeds removed and halved

recipeInstructions.text: Place a frying pan on a high heat until smoking. Take 1 tbsp of the oil and coat the corn, Zucchini and capsicum well with seasoning. Place in the pan to char on all sides and the Zucchini and capsicum become tender.

Remove the corn from the cob and roughly chop the Zucchini and Capsicum. Place the remaining oil, lime juice, mustard and caster sugar in a large bowl and mix to dissolve the sugar. Add the charred vegetables and coriander to the bowl and toss to cover.
Heat the Ben's OriginalTM rice according to pack instructions and separate between two plates. Top with the dressed salad and place the sliced avocado and dollop of sour cream to the side.
